content.title: Six shot dead in ‘terror attack’ in Burkina Faso - The Punch
content.desc: Six people were shot dead on Monday by police in eastern Burkina Faso during a “terrorist attack” on a security patrol, security sources said. An officer was also ...

content.title: Five dead in Burkina bomb attack - Vanguard
content.desc: Five people, four of them police, were killed when their vehicle struck an improvised explosive device (IED) in Burkina Faso, security sources said Saturday.

content.title: Western donors pledge over € 2bn anti-terror aid for Mauritania, Burkina Faso, Chad, Mali, Niger - Vanguard
content.desc: Western donors said Thursday they have pledged 2.4 billion euros ($2.7 billion) in funding aimed at preventing terrorism and lawlessness along the southern ...
